text: Tolna County is an administrative county in Hungary. It was a county of the former Kingdom of Hungary. It is in central Hungary, on the west bank of the river Danube. It has borders with the Hungarian counties Somogy, Fejér, Bács- Kiskun, and Baranya. The capital of Tolna county is Szekszárd. Its area is 3703 km2.
title: Tolna County
